translated: The Chapter on the Conditions🔽The Triad-Couplet-Conditioned Arising Discourse

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽16.47. Sanidassanattika, Sahetukaduka🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasahetuko dhammo🔽uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho🔽nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sani dassana ttika sa hetuka duka  anidassana appaṭigham sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ  uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ  na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigham sa hetukam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasahetuko ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasahetuko ca🔽dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na sa hetukaḥ ca na a nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na sa hetukaḥ ca 🔽dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha 🔽anidassana appaṭigham ahetukam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
